title: Is Vinayaka Mission University valid in Jammu? - Quora
tags: Jammu City, Jammu and Kashmir, India

response.answer_text: The vinayaka Missions is however a recognised university but the J&k high court in a case namely Nahida Shaheen vs The state of J&k and others on 31 August 2015 refused to consider the Msc in zoology from vinakaya university. So, i would recommend you to look for other options around.
